data.title: Dark Tower Special Offer
data.text:
Donald M. Grant, Publisher is making available to all customers, including those not eligible to buy an Artist Edition of The Dark Tower VII, a Dark Tower Special Offer.

This offer consists of a copy of the Artist Edition of The Dark Tower VII: The Dark Tower packaged with the limited edition slipcased set of The Talisman and its sequel Black House by authors Stephen King and Peter Straub—a saving of $50.00!

These limited editions, The Talisman and Black House, each have 11 new full color plates, numerous black and white devices and book design by award winning artist Rick Berry and come as a set in a stamped slipcase.

The copy of The Talisman is numbered and is signed by author Peter Straub and artist Rick Berry. The Talisman and Black House contain characters and events crucial to Roland’s quest of the Dark Tower.

Please note that most copies of BLACK HOUSE have a manufacturing defect – bits of white from the dust jacket have adhered to the black covering of the book. As we have less than 50 sets left we cannot open the sets looking for a perfect copy for you.

This item has a shipping surcharge of $8
